metadata.name: Connection

Connection
metadata.description: as well as expose the API calls.

title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#project
metadata.description: Returns the value of attribute project

metadata.name: project=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#project=
metadata.description: Sets the attribute project

params.name: value
params.description: the value to set the attribute project to.

metadata.name: credentials
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#credentials

metadata.name: credentials=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#credentials=
metadata.description: Sets the attribute credentials

params.name: value
params.description: the value to set the attribute credentials to.

metadata.name: initialize
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#initialize
metadata.description: Creates a new Connection instance.

metadata.name: list_datasets
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#list_datasets
metadata.description: Lists all datasets in the specified project to which you have been granted the READER dataset role.

metadata.name: get_dataset
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#get_dataset
metadata.description: Returns the dataset specified by datasetID.

metadata.name: insert_dataset
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#insert_dataset
metadata.description: Creates a new empty dataset.

metadata.name: patch_dataset
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#patch_dataset
metadata.description: Updates information in an existing dataset, only replacing fields that are provided in the submitted dataset resource.

metadata.name: delete_dataset
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#delete_dataset
metadata.description: Deletes the dataset specified by the datasetId value. Before you can delete a dataset, you must delete all its tables, either manually or by specifying force: true in options. Immediately after deletion, you can create another dataset with the same name.

metadata.name: list_tables
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#list_tables
metadata.description: Lists all tables in the specified dataset. Requires the READER dataset role.

metadata.name: get_table
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#get_table
metadata.description: Gets the specified table resource by table ID. This method does not return the data in the table, it only returns the table resource, which describes the structure of this table.

metadata.name: insert_table
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#insert_table
metadata.description: Creates a new, empty table in the dataset.

metadata.name: patch_table
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#patch_table
metadata.description: Updates information in an existing table, replacing fields that are provided in the submitted table resource.

metadata.name: delete_table
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#delete_table
metadata.description: Deletes the table specified by tableId from the dataset. If the table contains data, all the data will be deleted.

metadata.name: list_tabledata
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#list_tabledata
metadata.description: Retrieves data from the table.

metadata.name: list_jobs
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#list_jobs
metadata.description: Lists all jobs in the specified project to which you have been granted the READER job role.

metadata.name: get_job
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#get_job
metadata.description: Returns the job specified by jobID.

metadata.name: job_query_results
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#job_query_results
metadata.description: Returns the query data for the job

metadata.name: table_ref_from_s
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection.table_ref_from_s
metadata.description: Extracts at least tbl group, and possibly dts and prj groups, from strings in the formats: “my_table”, “my_dataset.my_table”, or “my-project:my_dataset.my_table”. Then merges project_id and dataset_id from the default table if they are missing.

metadata.name: insert_dataset_request
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#insert_dataset_request
metadata.description: Create the HTTP body for insert dataset

metadata.name: list_jobs_params
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#list_jobs_params
metadata.description: The parameters for the list_jobs call.

metadata.name: insert_table_request
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#insert_table_request
metadata.description: Create the HTTP body for insert table

metadata.name: query_table_config
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#query_table_config
metadata.description: Job description for query job

metadata.name: copy_table_config
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#copy_table_config
metadata.description: Job description for copy job

metadata.name: load_media
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Connection#load_media
metadata.description: rubocop:enable all
